subject: Re: Phonak and Unitron marketing sites

full_threads.body:
Hi Cameron and Eric,

Thanks for your patience on this one.

We have added the Privacy Policy you sent through to these three sites:

https://phonakmarketing.com.au/
https://unitronmarketing.com.au/
https://unitronlaunch.com.au/

If there are any other policies you would like added, please send them through.

Hi Guys

I don't remember seeing a reply on below.

Any luck with an ETA?

Regards

Cameron

Hi Guys

Do you have a rough ETA on this one?

Regards

Cameron

Hi Heath,

No worries, those should be attached.

Thanks,

Eric

Digital Marketing & Brand Support

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd

AU

full_threads.body:
Hi Eric,

I can't seem to open those links. If you can supply the cookie policy you require, we can upload it with a banner etc.

full_threads.body: Just a friendly reminder that this ticket has been open for over 5 days. Please close it if it's resolved or follow up if necessary. Thanks!

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Heath Maguire
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Guys,


We've been advised we need to make some changes to the Phonak and Unitron makering site.


Here's what we've been told:


"Dear Cameron,


Thank you for reaching out to our team.


Please note that according to Australian privacy requirements, every website must inform users of the collection of cookies and provide them with the possibility to opt-out.


For this reason, if these websites collect cookies and/or other tracking technologies, the requirements indicated in our Cookie toolkit (see group 2 requirements, page 10) should be respected:
  1. when entering the website, a specific cookie banner should be displayed. The cookie banner should contain the following information: identify of the entity, the cookie collected, how to opt-out from cookies and a link to the Cookie Privacy Notice
  2. users should be given the possibility to opt-out from cookies by clicking on a specific cookie preference center and


In this regard, to provide you with the right templates for cookie banner, cookie privacy notice and cookie preference center, and in line with our cookie roll-out plan, I will need you to compile this cookie questionnaire (please find here instructions on how to compile it) and send it to me.


In addition, please note that every public facing website should also contain our Global Privacy Policies in its footer (i.e. Global Privacy Policy, Global Web and Cookie Privacy Policy). Please find relevant official communication sent here.


Furthermore, if the website is used to collect personal data, such as via the form contained in Phonak Marketing Catalogue and in Unitron Marketing, then specific privacy language should be provided. In this regard, to efficiently provide you with the right language, you should compile the DPIA light attached, explaining what data you collect and why (do you use this information to send marketing emails?).


Hope this clarifies!"


Can you let us know what these changes will cost and a rough time frome to make the changes to both sites?


Thanks,
Eric










Eric Newby
Digital Marketing & Brand Support

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd

12 Inglewood Place, NSW 2153 Norwest, AU
Email: eric.newby@sonova.com
Website: www.sonova.com
